languages.text: "И снова вы, шерин, балуете меня блеском своего присутствия! Решили вновь потешить душу жемчугом моего красноречия? Или желаете обсудить деловые вопросы с новоиспеченной держательницей Меркатум Табула Официале?" {n}Улыбка Джай сияет ярче самой лучезарной звезды.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "И снова вы, шерин, балуете меня блеском своего присутствия! Решили вновь потешить душу жемчугом моего красноречия? Или желаете обсудить деловые вопросы с новоиспеченной держательницей Меркатум Табула Официале?" {n}Улыбка Джай сияет ярче самой лучезарной звезды.{/n}

languages.text: "You are spoiling me with the splendour of your presence again, shereen! Have you decided to treat your soul to the fruits of my eloquence? Or do you wish to discuss business with the newly appointed owner of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale?" {n}Jae's smile shines brighter than any star you have seen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И снова вы, шерин, балуете меня блеском своего присутствия! Решили вновь потешить душу жемчугом моего красноречия? Или желаете обсудить деловые вопросы с новоиспеченной держательницей Меркатум Табула Официале?" {n}Улыбка Джай сияет ярче самой лучезарной звезды.{/n}

Or do you wish to discuss business with the newly appointed owner of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale?" {n}Jae's smile shines brighter than any star you have seen.{/n}

languages.text: “你再次大驾光临，真是让我受宠若惊，亲爱的！你是打算让你的灵魂享受我们之间论辩的成果吗？还是说，你希望与帝国官方行商执照的新主人讨论生意上的事情？”{n}婕伊的笑容比你见过的任何星星都要更加明亮。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are spoiling me with the splendour of your presence again, shereen! Have you decided to treat your soul to the fruits of my eloquence? Or do you wish to discuss business with the newly appointed owner of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale?" {n}Jae's smile shines brighter than any star you have seen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你再次大驾光临，真是让我受宠若惊，亲爱的！你是打算让你的灵魂享受我们之间论辩的成果吗？还是说，你希望与帝国官方行商执照的新主人讨论生意上的事情？”{n}婕伊的笑容比你见过的任何星星都要更加明亮。{/n}

languages.original_text: "You are spoiling me with the splendour of your presence again, shereen! Have you decided to treat your soul to the fruits of my eloquence? Or do you wish to discuss business with the newly appointed owner of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale?" {n}Jae's smile shines brighter than any star you have seen.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Otra vez que me honra con su presencia, shereen! ¿Ha decidido disfrutar de los frutos de mi elocuencia? ¿O acaso desea hablar de negocios con la recién nombrada dueña de una Mercatum Tabula Officiale?». {n}La sonrisa de Jae brilla con más fuerza que ninguna estrella que hayas visto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are spoiling me with the splendour of your presence again, shereen! Have you decided to treat your soul to the fruits of my eloquence? Or do you wish to discuss business with the newly appointed owner of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale?" {n}Jae's smile shines brighter than any star you have seen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Otra vez que me honra con su presencia, shereen! ¿Ha decidido disfrutar de los frutos de mi elocuencia? ¿O acaso desea hablar de negocios con la recién nombrada dueña de una Mercatum Tabula Officiale?». {n}La sonrisa de Jae brilla con más fuerza que ninguna estrella que hayas visto.{/n}

languages.text: 「またあんたの存在の素晴らしさであたしを堕落させるつもりかい、シャリーン！あたしの雄弁の果実で魂をもてなそうと決めたのかい？それとも、新しくメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルのオーナーに任命された方と、ビジネスの話をしたいのかい？{n}ジェイの微笑みは、あなたが見たどんな星よりも輝いていた。」{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are spoiling me with the splendour of your presence again, shereen! Have you decided to treat your soul to the fruits of my eloquence? Or do you wish to discuss business with the newly appointed owner of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale?" {n}Jae's smile shines brighter than any star you have seen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「またあんたの存在の素晴らしさであたしを堕落させるつもりかい、シャリーン！あたしの雄弁の果実で魂をもてなそうと決めたのかい？それとも、新しくメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルのオーナーに任命された方と、ビジネスの話をしたいのかい？{n}ジェイの微笑みは、あなたが見たどんな星よりも輝いていた。」{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr verwöhnt mich erneut mit dem Glanz Eurer Anwesenheit, Shereen! Habt Ihr entschieden, Eure Seele mit den Früchten meiner Eloquenz zu nähren? Oder möchtet Ihr mit der neu ernannten Eigentümerin der Mercatum Tabula Officiale Geschäftliches besprechen?" {n}Jaes Lächeln strahlt heller als jeder Stern, den du je gesehen hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are spoiling me with the splendour of your presence again, shereen! Have you decided to treat your soul to the fruits of my eloquence? Or do you wish to discuss business with the newly appointed owner of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale?" {n}Jae's smile shines brighter than any star you have seen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr verwöhnt mich erneut mit dem Glanz Eurer Anwesenheit, Shereen! Habt Ihr entschieden, Eure Seele mit den Früchten meiner Eloquenz zu nähren? Oder möchtet Ihr mit der neu ernannten Eigentümerin der Mercatum Tabula Officiale Geschäftliches besprechen?" {n}Jaes Lächeln strahlt heller als jeder Stern, den du je gesehen hast.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous me gâtez en me gratifiant à nouveau de votre majestueuse présence, shereen ! Aviez-vous envie de vous délecter des fruits de mon éloquence ? Ou souhaitez-vous parler affaires avec la nouvelle détentrice d'une Mercatum Tabula Officiale ? » {n}Jae vous adresse un sourire plus lumineux qu'une étoile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are spoiling me with the splendour of your presence again, shereen! Have you decided to treat your soul to the fruits of my eloquence? Or do you wish to discuss business with the newly appointed owner of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale?" {n}Jae's smile shines brighter than any star you have seen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous me gâtez en me gratifiant à nouveau de votre majestueuse présence, shereen ! Aviez-vous envie de vous délecter des fruits de mon éloquence ? Ou souhaitez-vous parler affaires avec la nouvelle détentrice d'une Mercatum Tabula Officiale ? » {n}Jae vous adresse un sourire plus lumineux qu'une étoile.{/n}

languages.text: "Beni mevcudiyetinin muazzamlığıyla bir kez daha şımartıyorsun şirinim! Ruhunun, tatlı dilimin meyveleriyle ziyafet çekmesine mi karar verdin? Yoksa Mercatum Tabula Officiale'nin yeni atanmış hamiliyle iş konuşmak mı istiyorsun?" {n}Jae'ın gülümsemesi, gördüğün bütün yıldızlardan daha parlak.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are spoiling me with the splendour of your presence again, shereen! Have you decided to treat your soul to the fruits of my eloquence? Or do you wish to discuss business with the newly appointed owner of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale?" {n}Jae's smile shines brighter than any star you have seen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Beni mevcudiyetinin muazzamlığıyla bir kez daha şımartıyorsun şirinim! Ruhunun, tatlı dilimin meyveleriyle ziyafet çekmesine mi karar verdin? Ya da Mercatum Tabula Officiale'nin yeni atanmış sahibiyle iş konuşmak mı istiyordun?" {n}Jae'ın gülümsemesi, gördüğün bütün yıldızlardan daha parlak.{/n}
